title: Ep19 Gossip at the Corpse Cart
description: This month's Gossip at the Corpse Cart dishes up a really depressing alligator attack, a solid dose of #MeToo justice, a flirting fail, and one very sh*tty lizard, plus a convo with comedian Antoinette Stevens about communicating through humor. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
